mapper.select: select printcount from reim_value where id = #{id}
select printcount from task_value where id = #{id}
select count(*) from task_value where Executive = #{e} and Accounting = #{a} and Manager = #{m} and Finance = #{f}
select count(*) from reim_value where Accounting = #{a} and Manager = #{m} and Finance = #{f}
select count(*) from purch_value where Manager = #{m} and Executive = #{e}
select count(*) from loan_value where Manager = #{m} and Finance = #{f}
select name from user_value order by name asc
select username from user_value where name = #{name}
select totalprice from task_value where name = #{name} and status = 1 and odertime between to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
select count(*) from task_value where name = #{name} and status = 1 and odertime between to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
select price from Reim_value where name = #{name} and status = 1 and odertime between to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select count(*) from operation_value where odertime between to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select * from (select rownum as rn,t1.* from (select * from operation_value order by odertime desc) t1 where odertime between to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))tab where tab.rn >=#{rowNumMin} and tab.rn <=#{rowNumMax}
select count(*) from operation_value where name = #{name} and odertime between to_date(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
